title: thought of suicide randomly and it won't leave me alone

thread.content: hello my name is Rodger and I'm a teenage male and I wanna get straight to the point I have a lot of anxiety now and then and the other day it spiked and I was very scared...and still am...but anyways I thought of suicide randomly and it won't leave me alone and I've been having a lot of depression and anxiety over it because I would never do such a thing to myself but I read some forums about suicide and I'm afraid it'll get worse until I can't control it...is this normal...will it go away...why am I having these thoughts?
thread.author: rara1311

thread.content: Hi Rodger- I am not sure what you mean get straight? If you are on drugs, then yes, you need to get off of them and "go straight". But if you are gay,that is perfectly fine and you don't have to "go straight". No matter what the cause,you need to ASAP have your parents or guidance counselor or someone who can do this for you-make an appointment with a mental health professional.Suicidal thoughts are considered a medical emergency so this should be done NOW. Meanwhile, you can call this 24 hour hotline to talk to a mental health professional. Tell them how you are feeling and let them guide you to how best to make an appointment. Here is that #-24/7: 1-800-273-8255. Note that these thoughts are NOT uncommon for any teenager, Rodger- you are not alone. Make some calls and get some help and it will be OK. Best wishes, Dr.Kim
thread.author: Dr. Kim Crawford
